name: SOMEWHERE IN THE MAZE
description:
ATG STUDIOS Presenting a New Release(This is a Submission for LUDUM DARE JAM - 47)

This Game is Developed and Published Under ATG STUDIOS,

Play this Where u have to Come out of the Maze by Tackling various Guards and other Problems,
